ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] How did you play when you were 15th?
ygData.msgSnippet: Dual wield does not allow you to equip an instrument and a weapon. Another viable strategy for dealing with multiples outdoors, is to get the extras on you and
ygData.messageBody:
Dual wield does not allow you to equip an instrument and a weapon.

Another viable strategy for dealing with multiples outdoors, is to get the
extras on you and then flip on Selo's and run in circles around the group.
The group should then pick singles from your parade. This works nicely as
long as the group understands what to do before it happens (same as
lullaby).

Gilgurth
Bard of 25 Winces
E'ci
